message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 600000 for me and 400000 for you.
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. Take it or leave it!
I've adjusted my offer based on the rejection from the previous round. My new proposal is 550000 for me and 450000 for you. Let me know if this works for you.
